block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Welcome back to our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Today we are making the paper plane 005, the Astro Tube by Stephen Weiss. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 004 : Tumble Wing by Kōsho Uchiyama", please find it at https://youtu.be/EbXrPRykn88 Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
